instruction: Construct a poem with the words 'spring', 'joy', and 'rain'.
output:
The flowers of spring, the joy that it brings, 
The sun in the skies, the rain that will rise, 
A misty morning, a lovely afternoon, 
The beauty of life within a single bloom. 

The birds that will sing, the days that will bring, 
The moments to share, the things to be spared, 
A gentle reminder that life is alive, 
When the seasons shall change, the soul will revive.
